short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will grab all emails from visited pages without any limitations !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will grab all emails from visited pages without any limitations !

All emails will be saved automatically without effort from your side.

If you already copy or save these emails you can delete the stored email.

Features:
- Extract Email Address from Web Pages Automatically
- Auto-save all Email Address in the local storage
- Local Storage
